tool_description: Unlock Spotify Music Database and seamlessly access and extract music data from Spotify's vast catalog with SpotiScrape, the ultimate API for developers and music enthusiasts.
name: SpotiScrape
title: SpotiScrape

api_list.name: Get Track Info
api_list.description:
Get Track Info of Spotify Song

To use this endpoint you either need **url** of the Song on Spotify or the **trackID** of the song on Spotify

To get trackID of a Spotify Song Simply go the url of the Song
Example : [Stereo Hearts (feat. Adam Levine)](https://open.spotify.com/track/0qOnSQQF0yzuPWsXrQ9paz)
URL : https://open.spotify.com/track/0qOnSQQF0yzuPWsXrQ9paz

**0qOnSQQF0yzuPWsXrQ9paz** is the trackID of the Spotify Song

api_list.name: Get User Following Details
api_list.description:
Get a List of Artists followed by the Logged in Spotify User or any Other User from UserID

In order to use this Endpoint, you will need sp_dc cookie value from your logged in spotify account

Visit [here](https://te.legra.ph/How-to-get-Spotify-sp-dc-cookie-07-11) to know more

To get UserID of a Spotify User Simply go the url of the User
Example : [Aryan](https://open.spotify.com/user/31m4en72cpcracygwoxaiitbr2ba)
URL : https://open.spotify.com/user/31m4en72cpcracygwoxaiitbr2ba

**31m4en72cpcracygwoxaiitbr2ba** is the UserID of the Spotify User

api_list.name: Get Top Tracks
api_list.description:
Get Top Tracks Details of a Spotify User

In order to use this Endpoint, you will need sp_dc cookie value from your logged in spotify account

Visit [here](https://te.legra.ph/How-to-get-Spotify-sp-dc-cookie-07-11) to know more

api_list.name: Get Recommended Tracks
api_list.description:
Get Recommended Tracks from a track or song on Spotify

To use this endpoint you either need **url** of the Song on Spotify or the **trackID** of the song on Spotify

To get trackID of a Spotify Song Simply go the url of the Song
Example : [Stereo Hearts (feat. Adam Levine)](https://open.spotify.com/track/0qOnSQQF0yzuPWsXrQ9paz)
URL : https://open.spotify.com/track/0qOnSQQF0yzuPWsXrQ9paz

**0qOnSQQF0yzuPWsXrQ9paz** is the trackID of the Spotify Song

api_list.name: Add Artist to Library (Follow Artist)
api_list.description:
Add Artist to Library which means you can use this endpoint to Follow a Artist on Spotify

To use this endpoint you either need **url** of the PlayArtist on Spotify or the **artistID** of the Artist on Spotify

To get artistID of a Spotify Playlist Simply go the url of the Artist
Example : [Gym Class Heroes](https://open.spotify.com/artist/4IJczjB0fJ04gs4uvP0Fli)
URL : https://open.spotify.com/artist/4IJczjB0fJ04gs4uvP0Fli

**4IJczjB0fJ04gs4uvP0Fli** is the artistID of the Spotify Artist

api_list.name: Get Home Page Details
api_list.description:
Get Home Page data of Logged in Spotify Account

In order to use this Endpoint, you will need sp_dc cookie value from your logged in spotify account

Visit [here](https://te.legra.ph/How-to-get-Spotify-sp-dc-cookie-07-11) to know more

api_list.name: Get Users Details
api_list.description:
Get Details of the logged in User

In order to use this Endpoint, you will need sp_dc cookie value from your logged in spotify account

Visit [here](https://te.legra.ph/How-to-get-Spotify-sp-dc-cookie-07-11) to know more

api_list.name: Remove Artist From Library (Unfollow Artist)
api_list.description:
Remove Artist to Library which means you can use this endpoint to Remove a Follow for a Artist on Spotify

To use this endpoint you either need **url** of the Artist on Spotify or the **artistID** of the Artist on Spotify

To get artistID of a Spotify Playlist Simply go the url of the Artist
Example : [Gym Class Heroes](https://open.spotify.com/artist/4IJczjB0fJ04gs4uvP0Fli)
URL : https://open.spotify.com/artist/4IJczjB0fJ04gs4uvP0Fli

**4IJczjB0fJ04gs4uvP0Fli** is the artistID of the Spotify Artist

api_list.name: Get Search Results
api_list.description:
Get Search Results from a Query

Available **Filters** are listed below which can be added in the body:
`albums`
`artists`
`audiobooks`
`episodes`
`genres`
`playlists`
`podcasts`
`users`

api_list.name: Get User Followers Details
api_list.description:
Get the lists of Followers of a Spotify User 

In order to use this Endpoint, you will need sp_dc cookie value from your logged in spotify account

To get UserID of a Spotify User Simply go the url of the User

URL : https://open.spotify.com/user/31m4en72cpcracygwoxaiitbr2ba

**31m4en72cpcracygwoxaiitbr2ba** is the UserID of the Spotify User

api_list.description:
Get Detailed Playlist Info

To get playlistID of a Spotify Playlist Simply go the url of the Playlist
Example : [Favv Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/6fG5pFkuw76KDnZuyAT9gK)
URL : https://open.spotify.com/playlist/6fG5pFkuw76KDnZuyAT9gK

**6fG5pFkuw76KDnZuyAT9gK** is the playlistID of the Spotify Playlist

api_list.name: Get Lyrics
api_list.description:
Get Time Synced Lyrics of a Song on Spotify

To use this endpoint you either need **url** of the song or the **trackID** of the song

To get trackID of a Spotify Song Simply go the url of the Playlist
Example : [Stereo Hearts (feat. Adam Levine)](https://open.spotify.com/track/0qOnSQQF0yzuPWsXrQ9paz)
URL : https://open.spotify.com/track/0qOnSQQF0yzuPWsXrQ9paz

**0qOnSQQF0yzuPWsXrQ9paz** is the trackID of the Spotify Song
